page.title: 20LIFE IN 1985
page.content: These are comments from children in class 3IL at Thornham School, Rochdale who were asked what it was like to live here in 1985. {"There's nothing to do except sit and {watch the cars on the motorway. The {weather is dull, its usually raining"} "A big problem is drugs. Drugs are being used by many people and the problem's getting bigger"{ {"People are gettong into the computer {age but I (as most people) have to go {to school to get an education"} "More and more cars and transport is being made and this crowding our world not to mention the pollution"{ {"Life is better now but for the people {who go around stealing, beating up old {people, vandalising and taking drugs. {Families are suffering because of all {the loss of jobs." }
